title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description:
Thoroughly revise and expand the detailed requirements for the EthicalAdCampaignVerifier platform. This includes: 
1. Defining clear ethical guidelines to be followed, with a focus on protecting user privacy, combating misinformation, and promoting fair advertising practices.
2. Establishing robust fact-checking standards, utilizing reliable sources and advanced AI algorithms.
3. Support for a wide range of advertising campaigns (e.g., display ads, video ads, native ads, social media ads, etc.).
4. A seamless user experience that caters to both advertisers and reviewers, with intuitive interfaces and real-time feedback mechanisms.
5. Additional features or considerations such as compatibility with specific ad formats, integrations with existing advertising systems, and scalability for future updates.
6. Identify potential challenges and propose solutions for each requirement.

title: Design System Architecture for Ethical Ad Campaign Verification Platform
description: Design the overall system architecture for the Ethical Ad Campaign Verifier platform. This includes defining components for ad campaign ingestion, ethical analysis, fact-checking, content moderation, and reporting. The design should take into account scalability, performance, security, and maintainability. Outline the high-level components, their interactions, data flows, and integration points.

title: Develop Ethical Analysis Module
description: Implement the AI-driven module responsible for analyzing the ethical implications of advertising campaigns based on the defined guidelines.

title: Develop Fact-Checking Module
description: Implement the module responsible for verifying the factual accuracy of advertising campaigns based on reliable sources.

title: Design and Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the platform, allowing users to submit advertising campaigns for verification and view the analysis results.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for storing advertising campaigns, analysis results, and other relevant data.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Implement security measures and access controls to ensure the platform's data and functionality are protected from unauthorized access or misuse.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the platform, enabling automated testing, building, and deployment processes.

title: Develop Test Suite and QA Processes
description: Create a comprehensive test suite and define quality assurance processes to ensure the platform's functionality, reliability, and adherence to requirements.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Develop technical documentation for the platform, including installation guides, API references, and user manuals.
